title: Our Staff
description: Meet the dedicated team of educators and administrators who make Mansarovar Public School a center of excellence. Our staff brings experience, passion, and expertise to guide students on their educational journey.

staff.name: Dr. Anand Sharma
staff.bio: Dr. Sharma has been leading Mansarovar Public School for 10 years with a vision to provide quality education and holistic development to all students.

staff.name: Mrs. Priya Gupta
staff.bio: Mrs. Gupta oversees academic excellence and student discipline, ensuring high standards are maintained throughout the school.

staff.name: Mr. Rajesh Kumar
staff.bio: Mr. Kumar brings innovation to science education with his practical approach and engaging teaching methods.

staff.name: Mrs. Sunita Patel
staff.bio: Mrs. Patel is passionate about literature and encourages creative writing among students.

staff.name: Mr. Vikas Malhotra
staff.bio: Mr. Malhotra makes mathematics accessible and enjoyable for all students with his unique teaching strategies.

staff.name: Mrs. Deepa Singh
staff.bio: Mrs. Singh ensures that our youngest students receive age-appropriate education in a nurturing environment.
